attributes.action: stop local councils charging council employees less than the general public to park in public car parks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local councils reduce number of free parking and increase charges to park. This is a bigger issue in more rural towns where parking is at a premium do to poor public transport. Less people come to shops. These council employees then allow themselves to be charged less than the general public for parking in the same car parks.
